message: In case there are limits that apply for sending with this server, you can set a second quota for it and it will only send in one second as many emails as you set here. Set it to 0 in order to not apply any second limit.

In case there are limits that apply for sending with this server, you can set a minute quota for it and it will only send in one minute as many emails as you set here. Set it to 0 in order to not apply any minute limit.
Are you sure you want to remove all items?
The value that the custom field should get after the subscriber clicks the link in the campaign
This campaign will target approximately {count} subscribers.

This report shows all the subscribers that were processed in order to receive your email.
It also show if the emails have been sent successfully or not.
